text: Eva "Evi" Maria Pracht (June 29, 1937 – February 15, 2021) was a German- Canadian horse rider. She competed in the 1984 Summer Olympics and was part of the bronze-medalist team at the 1988 Summer Olympics. She won a gold medal at the 1987 Pan American Games. Pracht was born in Würzburg, Germany. Pracht died on February 15, 2021 in Toronto, Ontario at the age of 83.Olympische amazone Eva Maria Pracht overleden == References == == Other websites == * Category:1937 births Category:2021 deaths Category:German equestrians Category:Naturalized citizens of Canada Category:Olympic bronze medalists for Canada Category:Olympic equestrians for Germany Category:German dressage riders
title: Eva Maria Pracht
